name: Simple Features Vocabulary
abstract: The Simple Features vocabulary defines additional geometry types connected to the GeoSPARQL type hierarchy

examples.title: LineString Geometry
examples.content: A LineString is a Curve with linear interpolation between Points. Each consecutive pair of Points defines a Line segment.

examples.title: MultiLineString Geometry
examples.content: A MultiLineString is a MultiCurve whose elements are LineStrings.
